description: A young Front-Line Surveyor of the Knights of Favonius, Mika is a dedicated support who provides healing and ATK SPD buffs to his team.
talents: Normal Attack: Spear of Favonius - Arrow's Passage
info: Mika is a Cryo support who excels at healing and increasing ATK SPD for his team. Build him for HP%, Energy Recharge, and Healing Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Spear of Favonius - Arrow's Passage
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Starfrost Swirl
skills.desc: Mika uses his crossbow to fire a Flowfrost Arrow that deals Cryo DMG and grants Soulwind to nearby active characters, increasing their ATK SPD. Hold: Fires a Rimestar Flare that can hit multiple enemies, granting Soulwind and additional healing.
skills.details_html:
Press
Fires a Flowfrost Arrow that deals Cryo DMG and grants Soulwind, increasing ATK SPD.
Hold
Fires a Rimestar Flare that splits into up to 3 Rimestar Shards, each dealing Cryo DMG and granting Soulwind and healing to hit characters.

skills.name: Skyfeather Song
skills.desc: Mika regenerates HP for all nearby party members based on his Max HP and grants the Eagleplume effect, which triggers healing when Normal Attacks hit enemies.
skills.details_html:
Skyfeather Song
Regenerates HP for all nearby party members based on Mika's Max HP and grants Eagleplume, which triggers healing when Normal Attacks hit enemies.

passive_talents.name: Suppressive Barrage
passive_talents.desc: When characters affected by Soulwind from Starfrost Swirl score a CRIT Hit, they gain a stack of Detector, increasing Physical DMG.

passive_talents.name: Topographical Mapping
passive_talents.desc: Each stack of Detector increases the Physical DMG Bonus of the active character by 10%. Max 3 stacks.

passive_talents.name: Demarcation
passive_talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Factor Confluence
constellations.desc: The Soulwind effect from Starfrost Swirl grants 1 additional stack of Detector.

constellations.name: Companion's Ingress
constellations.desc: When Mika's own Skyfeather Song's Eagleplume state heals a character, Mika regenerates 3 Energy.

constellations.name: Reconnaissance Experience
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Skyfeather Song by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sunfrost Encomium
constellations.desc: When characters affected by Soulwind from Starfrost Swirl score a CRIT Hit, Mika's own ATK SPD is increased by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Signal Arrow
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Starfrost Swirl by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Companion's Counsel
constellations.desc: The maximum number of Detector stacks from Soulwind is increased to 4.
